articles.author: Jonathan Noble
articles.title: McLaren reveals bold Senna-inspired F1 livery for Monaco GP - Motorsport.com
articles.description: McLaren has revealed a striking Ayrton Senna-inspired livery for Formula 1’s Monaco Grand Prix.
articles.content: The Woking-based team has worked with sponsor partner OKX on the complete takeover of the MCL38 colour scheme replacing its papaya orange with the yellow, green and blue colours of the late Brazilian… [+2272 chars]
